short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically claim your bonus on Twitch

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will claim your bonus on Twitch while you are enjoying the stream.

This extension does not collect or store any of your data. Also you can check the project's Github page : https://github.com/dogukandogru/twtichautobonusclaimer
